title: SerializeJSON
name: SerializeJSON
description: Converts CFML data into a JSON (JavaScript Object Notation) representation of the data.

arguments.name: var
arguments.description: A CFML data value or variable that represents one.

arguments.name: serializeQueryByColumns
arguments.description: A Boolean value that specifies how to serialize CFML queries.

arguments.name: charset
arguments.description:
string characters that cannot be encoded by this charset get escaped,
			if not set the web charset is used.
